short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps rapidly identify and select bookings for DVSA tests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically scans and searches for available test dates. It runs while you watch and selects dates based on your settings. This helps you beat the bots that are scraping these sites every day delaying you from getting test dates!
